Developer Tools - PhoneGap CLI

Command Line Tool for Developers

  • Create a new application
  • Add platforms to the application (Android, iOS, etc.)
  • Build and run applications via the command line
  • Install plugins
  • Build hooks for automating common build tasks. (Such as distributing icons)
  • Introduced in PhoneGap 3.0.0
  • Quickly bootstrap a new application
  • Add supported platforms
  • Build and run applications via the command line.
  • Search for available plugins and manage their distribution to other platforms
  • Hooks can be built in javascript to do common build tasks. (Such as distributing icons)
